attributes.action: Bring back the death penalty for paedophiles
attributes.additional_details: Paedophiles are able to reoffend after being convicted as the sentences are rarely longer than 2 years. Children will always be at risk so long as paedophiles are able to walk the same streets. We need to bring change.
attributes.background: Offenders who have been tried and convicted of paedophile charges, including sex offenders who downloaded, supplied and viewed indecent child images, should be sentenced to death.
